alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 8:58PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN ARANSAS...CALHOUN... SOUTH CENTRAL VICTORIA AND NORTHEASTERN REFUGIO COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM CDT... At 858 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Point Comfort to Green Lake to near McFaddin. Movement was south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Port Lavaca, Seadrift, Port Oconnor, McFaddin, Point Comfort, Alamo Beach, Indianola, Long Mott, Olivia, Green Lake, Tivoli, Aransas National Wildlife Refuge, Matagorda Island State Park, Magnolia Beach, and Austwell. This includes the following highways... US Highway 77 between mile markers 592 and 602. US Highway 87 between mile markers 834 and 840. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria
